|zh                 =
;今天是凯亚的生日哦，我们快去为他庆祝吧！
:'''派蒙：'''难得凯亚没有邀请我们去酒馆见呢。
:'''凯亚：'''我也不是每时每刻都在喝酒啊。
:'''派蒙：'''哇，架子上葡萄好像都熟了耶！
:'''凯亚：'''上次特纳教你的，还记得吗？到时候新酿好的饮品，可以给你们先尝尝。
:'''旅行者：'''摘葡萄？当然记得。
:'''派蒙：'''旅行者…那我们？
:（与派蒙、凯亚一起摘了许多葡萄）
:'''旅行者：'''呼…果然是力气活。
:'''派蒙：'''欸，是嘛？
|dialogue_review_zh = 「到时候新酿好的饮品，可以给你们先尝尝。」
|en                 =
;Today is [[Kaeya]]'s birthday, let's go and celebrate with him!
:'''Paimon:''' It's rare for Kaeya to not invite us to the tavern today.
:'''Kaeya:''' It's not like I'm drinking at all hours of the day.
:'''Paimon:''' Wow, all the grapes on the trellises have ripened!
:'''Kaeya:''' Do you remember everything Turner taught you last time? Once we finish brewing a new batch of drinks, you two can be the first to have a taste.
:'''Traveler:''' About picking grapes? Of course we remember.
:'''Paimon:''' So Traveler, shall we...?
:(You pick a lot of grapes together with Paimon and Kaeya)
:'''Traveler:''' Phew... This is hard work.
:'''Paimon:''' Huh, really?
|dialogue_review_en = "Once we finish brewing a new batch of drinks, you two can be the first to have a taste."
